name: Connected Dreams
summary: Connected Dreams is a Yume Nikki fangame, starring two girls named Nika and Mota. The goal is to explore and find items. One unique feature of this game is a collectible CD compartment that allows the player to assign the effects of their choices to the 1, 2, 3 or 4 hotkeys, allowing for quick effect equipping. The game also includes a combat system.
